content:
As you stay up all night researching, you come across various articles and forums discussing the idea of reptilian beings and their alleged manipulation of world governments. Many of the sources seem to be from conspiracy theorists and lack concrete evidence, but there are also some claims from supposed eyewitnesses.

You also find information about the Nordics and Greys, which seem to be less controversial in the UFO community. The Nordics are described as tall, blonde, and humanoid, often seen as benevolent beings. The Greys, on the other hand, are typically portrayed as small, grey-skinned beings with large eyes, often associated with abductions and medical experiments.

You start to feel overwhelmed by the amount of information and conflicting opinions on the topic, but you feel more prepared to meet with the ufologist.
